description: Development of a Cloud PaaS to provide Proof of Technology as a Service at Benchmark Power Systems department. The project is based on both Openstack and IBM Power specific components.

Development of new products, features and codebase tests at Inch, a real estate management startup which helps property management professionals in their day-to-day business and in their communication with residents. Firstly as an intern, then as a freelance developer.

In charge of all communication means, either external (website) or internal (intranet), and the infrastructure (computers and servers) of the Junior Entreprise at Grenoble Institute of Technology - Phelma.
